original_text: And he left them with the king of Moab, and they stayed with him all the time that David was in the stronghold.
korean_text: 부모를 인도하여 모압 왕 앞에 나아갔더니 그들은 다윗이 요새에 있을 동안에 모압 왕과 함께 있었더라

sentences.original_text: And he left them with the king of Moab
all the time that David was in the stronghold
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 요새에 있던 모든 시간 동안
